video.title: Years of Living Dangerously
video.synopsis: The Emmy-winning series follows celebrities and well-known jounalists investigating solutions to global climate change and its impact on humanity.

episodes.synopsis: Harrison Ford travels to Indonesia, a major source of greenhouse gas emissions; Don Cheadle hears opposing theories on the cause of the Texas drought.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Harrison Ford's investigation into the palm oil industry continues; Arnold Schwarzenegger joins a team of firefighters battling a new threat.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Congressman Michael Grimm has a new take on global warming in the wake of Superstorm Sandy; conservationist M. Sanjayan interviews leading scientists.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Lesley Stahl investigates global warming in Greenland; Ian Somerhalder sits in on an evangelical Christian family's debate over climate change.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Olivia Munn talks climate change with Washington State Governor Jay Inslee; columnist Mark Bittman examines efforts to rebuild after Superstorm Sandy.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: America Ferrera examines the Heartland Institute's opposition to clean energy initiatives; Mark Bittman investigates efforts to promote natural gas.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Jessica Alba talks with fellows in an MBA program promoting sustainability; Thomas L. Friedman discusses the Arab Spring's link to climate change.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Matt Damon explores the public health impact of heat waves; Michael C. Hall learns how climate change may force millions of people out of Bangladesh.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Michael C. Hall continues his exploration of climate change in Bangladesh; conservationist M. Sanjayan visits an active volcano in the southern Andes.
episodes.title: Episode 9
